pipelines.name: Customer LTV & Segmentation
pipelines.description: Identify high-value customers and optimize acquisition spend
pipelines.use_case: Predict customer lifetime value and segment by value tier
pipelines.business_outcome: Maximize ROI by focusing on customers with highest lifetime value

config_mapping.description: Standardize Shopify orders to unified schema
Write customer LTV segments to database

prediction_period_months.description: Number of months to predict forward for LTV

output_table_name.description: Table name for LTV segments output

output_write_mode.description: Write mode: replace (drop/recreate), append (add rows), merge (upsert)

pipelines.name: Marketing Attribution & ROI
pipelines.description: Understand which marketing channels drive conversions and calculate true ROI
pipelines.use_case: Multi-touch attribution across all marketing channels
pipelines.business_outcome: Optimize marketing spend by identifying high-ROI channels

config_mapping.description: Standardize marketing touchpoints across all platforms
Multi-touch attribution with time decay model

ad_sources.description: Marketing ad platforms to ingest (select one or more)

attribution_model.description: Attribution model (first_touch, last_touch, linear, time_decay, u_shaped, w_shaped)

lookback_window_days.description: Days to look back for attribution

output_destination.description: Database destination for pipeline output (DuckDB for local development, production databases for deployment)

output_write_mode.description: Write mode: replace (drop/recreate), append (add rows), merge (upsert)

pipelines.name: Churn Prevention & Retention

pipelines.business_outcome: Reduce churn rate by 20-30% through proactive intervention
